page.title: 16Board Games
page.content: A good way to pass the time, if there are two or more of you is to play board games. {Monopoly}is probably the all time favourite. It is a game of strategy, skill and luck. It consists of moving various objects round a square board, buying and selling property. To add to the luck department, there are 'Chance' and 'Community Chest' cards around the board. The aim is to gain the most money. Another popular game is{Trivial {Pursuit},where you have a small piece that you have to move around by answering questions of no importance whatsoever! The first person to collect four 'cheeseys', that you get by boarding special squares, wins. Other favourites include{Totopoly, {Cluedo, and Scrabble.}
